name: Fly Til You Crash
description:
The Game

An infinite-runner game where you fly through a procedural generated tunnel and avoid crashing for as long as you can to get the highest score.

Controls

Gamepad is recomended for this game, 


GamepadKeyboardMovementLeft Analog StickWASD/ArrowsBoostBShiftBrakeASpaceRoll Left
(Anti clockwise)LB
(Left Bumper)QRoll right
(Clockwise)RB
(Right Bumper)E Known bugs

At random the game stops responding, and does not respond after that.

During testing we noted the highscore being down at times, so if you don't find any highscore on the page, it's temporarily down.

Volume slider can only be changed once when game is started.

Credits Programmers

Adam Törngren, Oscar Oders, Sebastian Nilsson, Patrik Johansson, Joakim Svensson & Philip Åkerblom.

Computer Graphics

Alexandra Tapio, Axel Sparrmark, Rasmus Rigby, Wilma Ohlin & Cecilia Västeräng.

Audio

Music - Ev Productions - Oh boy it's some retrowave right here
